text: allah or utaranam kurukiran; oruvarutan oruvar karuttu verrumai kontirukkum pala ejamanarkalukku (uliyam ceyyum) oru manitanum; ore manitanukku (uliyam ceyyum piritoru) manitanum irukkinranar. Ivarkal iruvarum camamavarkala? Al'hamtu lillah - ellap pukalum allahvukke! Eninum, avarkalil perumpalor ariya mattarkal
